SETTING.CONFIRM_CONNECT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE: Do you want to connect the channel?
SETTING.CONFIRM_IMPORT_SCENARIO_MESSAGE: Importing another bot will overwrite the current configured bot, and the existing data cannot be restored. Are you sure you want to overwrite the scenario with the selected file?
SETTING.CONNECT_CHANNEL_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Channel successfully connected. If you want to activate the created bot, deploy the channel from the "Deployment" menu.
SETTING.DEACTIVATE_BOT_MESSAGE: Deactivating the bot will disconnect it from all channels, and it will no longer work on any channel. Are you sure you want to deactivate it?
SETTING.DELETE_BOT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Bot deletion can be canceled within 72 hours and cannot be recovered afterwards. Are you sure you want to proceed?
SETTING.DELETE_BOT_DESC:
Accounts with master-level or higher can delete bots and takes 72 hours from the time of deletion for the bot to be permanently removed.
Once a bot is deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with deletion if it is absolutely necessary.
SETTING.DISABLED_BOT_ACTIVATED_MESSAGE: Another bot is already active. Disable the active bot and try again.
SETTING.DISABLED_CONNECT_TEST_CHANNEL: Unable to Connect to Test Channel
SETTING.DISABLED_CONNECT_TEST_CHANNEL_INFO: Not Connected to Partners Center Test Channel
SETTING.DISABLED_DELETE_BOT_MESSAGE: Bot must be inactive to delete.
SETTING.DISABLED_IMPORT_SCENARIO_MESSAGE: Cannot import file. Please select again.
SETTING.DISCONNECT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE: If you disconnect the channel, the chatbot will no longer function within {{channel}} channel. Are you sure you want to disconnect?
SETTING.EXPORT_IMPORT_SCENARIOS_DESC: Importing a scenario will overwrite existing settings for scenarios, utterances, variables, and entities. However, the statistics and history will not be affected.
SETTING.NO_DELETE_BOT_ACCESS: No Permission to Delete the Bot
SETTING.NO_DELETE_BOT_ACCESS_MESSAGE: Accounts that are master-level or higher can delete bot.
SETTING.NO_RECOVER_BOT_ACCESS: No Permission to Cancel Bot Deletion
SETTING.NO_RECOVER_BOT_ACCESS_MESSAGE: Only master-level or higher accounts can cancel bot deletion.

SETTING.RECOVER_BOT_MESSAGE: Do you really want to cancel the bot deletion?
